parameters.content:
# Disparador de Campanha para ChatWoot
## Evolution API


v 1.3.1

parameters.query:
SELECT * 
FROM campaigns c 
WHERE account_id = ID_CHATWOOT
AND status_envia = 0
AND inbox_id = ID_DO_DISPARADOR
LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
    c.falhou, 
    c.enviou, 
    a.limite_disparo 
FROM 
    campaigns c
JOIN 
    accounts a ON c.account_id = a.id
WHERE 
    c.id = {{ $('IF6').item.json.id }};
